I can host groups over 900 guests.‚úÖ I have host teams from Google, Amazon, Tesla, Apple, General mills, instagram, schools & University ‚≠êONLY INDIAN EXPERIENCE with 100% 5‚≠êAre you tried of making pre mix chai tea ? & always wanted to learn authentic Chai? or you are missing that Indian Street Chai?, than your wait is overIn this experience I will share my family recipe of Masala Chai. we will make chai from the scratchLearn about‚¨á History of chaiHow tea got popular in IndiaHow the concept of Masala chai was bornUses and flavors of SpicesHow to brew that perfect cup of chaiBy the end you will have authentic chai and better understand about its background, its cultural aspect and a friend in India :)‚úÖThis Experience is GREAT for Schools & University students groupsCheck my Top RATED Experience on Airbnb Samosa & Coriander Chutney(https://www.airbnb.co.in/experiences/1694352‚úÖ I can customize menu for groups and Private bookings NOTETickets are per person, not per Screen
about_author: I'm Jd a true Delhi-ite . My family have a restaurant since 3 generations (since 1956). I grew up in a big, Punjabi family that was always eating or planning the next meal. Every holiday meant hours around the table. Cooking and eating together was how I learned to show love and to share happiness. Eating and Sharing my cuisine and making connections with people that I love the most, this love took to start cooking classes and food tours.I've been organizing  cooking classes and food tours in Delhi for past 6 years. Since last year I have started online cooking classes live from my Kitchen in Delhi, so far I have hosted more than 4k+ guest's from all over the world and hosted many big events for companies like Google, Apple, Youtube, Amazon, Pinterest, Instagram, Netgear, Toast, etc.

title: Bake Pastel de Nata with Portuguese Chef
address: Lisbon, Portugal¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 2 hours ¬∑ Hosted in English, Spanish, French, and Portuguese
act_int: We will bring the sweetest side of Portugal to your home. Our baking experience happens live from the kitchen of our FAMILY BAKERY!Here's what our previous students are saying: https://www.airbnb.com/pasteldenataIf you can‚Äôt visit us here in beautiful Lisbon right now, we will share with you all the steps so that you can enjoy Pastel de Nata at home. We will use STAPLE INGREDIENTS and break down the recipe into EASY to follow steps.We will make puff pastry from scratch and demystify the process. But if you rather keep it simple, we will also show you how to make the most of store-bought pastry. We will share all the pro tricks to make bakery level Portuguese Custard Tarts, aka Egg Tarts, at home.You can make just one booking and bring your wife, husband, children or pet along. 1 booking = 1 household / deviceWe hope this online experience is just your first step towards embracing Portuguese food. In fact, after we hang out and bake together virtually, we still want to welcome you here in Portugal so that we can meet face to face. So when you finally get to travel to Lisbon, you are invited to visit Jo√£o's bakery and have his freshly baked Pastel de Nata and coffee, for FREE!* ADULTS & CHILDREN welcome! No previous cooking experience required! * PRIVATE EXPERIENCES: tailor-made for GROUPS or PROFESSIONAL BAKERS, on a day and time that works best for you
about_author: We are Zara & Jo√£o, a Portuguese food writer and a 5th generation pastry chef & bakery owner, passionate about spreading the love for Portuguese food all over the world! Our obsession? PASTEL DE NATA! Which you may also know as PORTUGUESE CUSTARD TARTS or  EGG TARTS.Over the past 2 years, Jo√£o has welcomed thousands of travelers from around the world in Lisbon‚Äôs only pastry workshop to take place inside an actual bakery. Now, still from inside his bakery's kitchen, he will share with you his award-winning family recipe... no matter where you are!Zara will help you prepare everything before the online class and give you support afterwards, whenever you try to bake at home. Our experience starts on Airbnb, but doesn‚Äôt end once the class finishes. We‚Äôre all about connecting over food and we hope to bring a taste of Portugal to your home!

title: Southern Fried Chicken and Biscuits with Lee Anna
address: Los Angeles, California, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: For this online class, we'll be making my grandmothers delicious buttermilk biscuits and southern fried chicken. You don't need any special tools, just a little bit of technique and a big appetite! I'm a personal chef and host of in-person cooking classes, so I'm excited to be bringing my love for food online and share my family's recipes right from my kitchen. For the class, we'll talk about how to guarantee your chicken comes out golden brown, flavorful, and all the way done every time, my tricks to delicious tender biscuits, and make both recipes in real time to enjoy! Feel free to make one, both, or neither--this class is at your own pace. I'll provide a list of ingredients and the recipes so that you'll have everything you need to make these southern traditions in your own home and provide realtime feedback and answer any questions you have about the process and your work.I want this class to feel like we're in the kitchen making food and sharing stories together, so get comfy, bring a friend, and let's make some memories together.
about_author: I'm a personal chef, host of a monthly supper club pop up restaurant in Los Angeles, and have been making these recipes for and with friends and family for my entire life! My grandmother taught me how to make biscuits and I've spent years finding the perfect recipe for my favorite fried chicken, so I'm ready to share this knowledge and pass down family traditions to new friends around the world.

Highly recommend Lee's class!", 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'February 2022', 'name': 'Alison', 'comment': 'We learned so much from Lee during our Valentine‚Äôs Southern Fried Chicken and biscuits lesson! She was on time, a great conversationalist, and super down-to-earth. And the food? So, so, so good! Big thumbs up from the whole family (even the picky eater!). I would highly recommend this class', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'February 2022', 'name': 'Cara', 'comment': 'We had a great time learning something new together in the kitchen today thanks to you and your very fun class.', 'reply': {}}]

title: Easy and delicious Montreal-style Bagels
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and French
act_int: Learn all about the culinary delight that is Montreal Bagels! You'll learn how they're different from American/NYC bagels (so many differences!), as well as lots of fun info all about bread making and working with yeast. Then, let's bake up a batch of homemade bagels - you'll be surprised at how easy it is!Other things to note:You're welcome to bake along, or you can just watch, take notes, and bake later!P.S. We have LOTS of availability! If you don't see the date or time that works for you, just send us a message, we're always happy to accommodate - and if you'd like a bigger group than the max listed here, that's fine too, just drop us a line!
about_author: Hey, I'm Jess! I'm the founder of the Lincoln Apartment Bakery here in Montreal, I'm also the host the TV baking show Flour Power, now airing all over the world, and I'm the author of The Lincoln Apartment Bakery cookbook! I've been baking for three decades and teaching for ten years, and I absolutely LOVE teaching people all about the science and art of home baking. I promise you'll learn something (if not a whole lot of things) you didn't know before the class!

title: Make Cannoli with a Sicilian Home Chef
address: Milano, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Italian
act_int: This is not an ordinary cooking experience, this is a delightful journey around the myths and rituals for make and for enjoy the Sicilian Cannoli.  I will guide you step by step through my Sicilian family recipe to make the famous Sicilian Cannoli, a delicious dessert with cream goes straight to the heart. You will discover the key elements that make the Cannoli a real delicacy: crunchy peel, milk cream and chocolate. The Traditional cannolis recipe is with Ricotta Cream, but you can use Whipped Cream or Cream Cheese or Vegan Cream.With the same recipe we can make traditional cannoli (fried), baked cannoli (my own recipe), summer cannoli (with strawberries or raspberries, blueberries, blackberries) and also the "Chiacchiere": Italian carnival fried cookies.Please Note! For individual bookings I have availability almost every Sunday until April 3rd.  Check my calendar!  Other things to note.‚úîÔ∏é One spot is for 1 person, not for the household.‚úîÔ∏é  If you don't find availability just contact me
about_author: I'm from Sicily, but live in Milan since 1999. My passion is cooking traditional Sicilian and Northern Italian food, Passion that's been handed down for generations in my family.  I've been a creative home chef since I was a boy. Since 2018 I‚Äôve welcomed more than 1.000 people to my "secret kitchen" and I've received many hundreds of good reviews for my two Live Cooking Experiences. Guests have called it ‚ÄúAn absolutely wonderful experience in Milan! ‚Äù, ‚Äútruly a once-in-a-lifetime experience‚Äù, and ‚Äúsomething unique‚Äù. Now I‚Äôm bringing my family tips to your kitchen with this Online Experience.I‚Äôm in Instagram with delicious photo and stories @theitaliansecretkitchen

title: Tart Tatin, the French Apple Pie
address: Nice, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and French
act_int: Explore French flavors with a French chef and learn how to make the best Tarte Tatin  ever.In this interactive online experience, I‚Äôll teach you how to make  French tarte satin. Once I walk you through this recipe step by step, you‚Äôll be able to re-create this dish to wow your family and friends in the future. We‚Äôll go through the basic recipes, and then I‚Äôll show you how to improve the standard dish to give it your own unique (and soon-to-be signature!) flavor.This experience is perfect for team-building or events like anniversary,  bachelorette party ...Reduction for group available. Fell free to contact me for a new date or time. French tarte tatin ingredients:Apples, butter, sugar, flour.You could do this recipe in family,  with friends or even for a team-building event. It's a good anniversary present. It's a way to spend some times with family or friends who are living far from you. It's having a fun moment with people you never met before from all around the world. It's a way to not have a boring day!I hope that you will join me on my best tarte satin recipe and after this cooking class, you would like to do my other cooking classes experiences like the French Macarons, the authentic French Baguette, the French Quiche, the Apple Crepe or the traditional union soup!
about_author: Over the past 2 years, I have welcomed many people around my table for a modern French breakfast or brunch and have received thousands of 5 stars reviews. Some of my guests have told me that I need a TV show to learn about my French cooking. Guess what, Airbnb has created the opportunity to do better: I bring you into my kitchen to learn my delicate pastries through the online experience.

title: Cute Animal Mochi Making
address: Tokyo, Japan¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: 1. You will learn the cultural background behind mochi. (Festivals that are involved in mochi)2. You will learn how to make the dough for the mochi3. You will learn  how to color the dough.4.  You will learn how to shape the dough to an animal motif. 5. Cook the mochi and learn how to enjoy it.We will be making two mochi animals (two pieces each) in this class. Even Months: Teddy Bear and KittyOdd Months: Frog and Pig
about_author: I've been teaching foreigners how to make mochi from my home in Tokyo since 2014. I've also hosted about 200 mochi making classes online since 2020. I know from my experience how to make the perfect mochi in person and online.

title: Easy and impressive French Macarons
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and French
act_int: WATCH AND LEARN OR BAKE ALONG AT HOME! Learn how to bake these sweet French treats from scratch! Whether you're a novice or a seasoned baker, you'll learn all about what makes French Macarons special, how to make the perfect meringue, the best mixing technique, how to perfectly pipe the batter, all about what's happening in the oven, how to avoid common mistakes, and then some delicious fillings and decoration. Yup - we cover everything!We demystify every step of this tricky little cookie, and make sure you get the personal attention you need to create something delicious!To note:You'll get the ingredients list by email before the class, so you can choose to watch the class and bake later, or bake along with me!P.S. We have LOTS of availability! If you don't see the date or time that works for you, just send us a message, we're always happy to accommodate - and if you'd like a bigger group than the max listed here, that's fine too, just drop us a line!
about_author: I'm the founder and head teacher at The Lincoln Apartment Bakery, a boutique baking school in Montreal. I am also the host of the TV baking show "Flour Power", now airing in more than 65 countries worldwide. I'm the author of The Lincoln Apartment Bakery cookbook, I've been teaching baking for over ten years, and eating dessert for over three decades...!

title: Classic Southern Sweet Potato Pie
address: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: For our online class, we'll be making a Classic Southern Sweet Potato Pie. I learned how to make my first with my Grandmother. She was the best southern cook and baker. I would love to show you how to make a pie to impress both your family and friends. No special tools are needed. You just need a willingness to learn and follow the pace of the class as I walk you through every step. I am a culinary instructor of both in-person and virtual cooking/baking classes. My background in food is both formal, self taught and I come from a long line of great southern cooks.  I'm passionate about sharing my love for food and classic recipes with others. For class, I will guide you through making a Sweet Potato Pie that is perfectly spiced, creamy and smooth with each bite and free from soggy bottoms. This class is at your pace. I will provide a list of ingredients and supplies once you are enrolled. From the beginning I will encourage you to ask questions in real time. The only thing that I ask for all of my classes, is that you be comfortable in our kitchen and enjoy yourself. Your Classic Southern Sweet Potato class is waiting for you...sign up now!
about_author: I am a virtual and in person culinary instructor. More so, for classic southern recipes like this, I learned from my Grandmother and other women in my family

title: Eastern European Pastries from Grandma's Recipe
address: New York, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English, Czech, and Slovakian
act_int: Let's have fun & travel to Slovakia with the most delicious traditional pastry! NOTE: part of the proceeds from this baking class goes straight to Slovak initiative "Kto pomoze Ukrajine" raising funds to provide Ukrainians with food and material helpIn this baking class I'll teach you how to make TWO traditional pastries from scratch: --> Kol√°ƒçe - traditional breakfast buns &--> Babka - sweet braided bread This is a VERY interactive class with YOU being able to bake, learn, and make the most of it. It is a relaxed, super fun yet educational class packed with plenty of fool-proof tips on how to work with yeast-based doughs to always achieve great results. During the class, I will be sharing about our rich culinary heritage & food customsWHAT WE'LL DO:1. We'll start the class by introducing the pastries and mixing the dough & the fillings2. We'll proceed with filling & shaping 3. We'll finish the class with baking & sampling our delicious treatsPLUS! After the class you'll receive THREE MORE traditional recipe that you can bake with the very same dough, yum! If the dates & times don't fit your schedule, please request the date & time for you and your group in a private message
about_author: Ahoj! My name is Lenka and I am a passionate baker & baking instructor from Slovakia. My main focus in baking is where my roots are - in Slovak, Eastern European & Russian cuisine. I am proud that my traditional bakes were featured in NY Times magazine and the class on Kolaches & Babka was rated one of the best online baking classes in the U.S. according to PureWow.I write and share about our rich culinary heritage on my blog www.wandering-senses.com and IG @bakewithlenkaMy love for baking goes back to the days when I was a small girl helping my grandma to knead the dough sitting on her knees. Since then I've had a chance to bake for hundreds of customers and to share my knowledge via baking classes with countless companies

title: Prepare something Sweet for Teatime
address: Buenos Aires, Argentina¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: As Argentinians  we like drinking mate a lot! we usually drink bitter Mate but we don`t like to drink it alone! That is why we would like to share with you a sweet and easy recipe! learn how to make Argentine palmier cookies along with Maria Ines This 30 minute online experience is ideal for kids and you will just need three ingredients! :)
about_author: Hi, Im Pablo!! I have been working in Tourism for more than 15 years. I am a passionate about my country, specially in everything related to Culture, History and Gastronomy.I do not work on my own, Instead I work along with  mates that share my passion too!!  Qualified Tour Guides and local experts who will show you Buenos Aires main highlights in an enrich, friendly and easygoing way. My team will love to share with you  expertise and Passion for our Country!

title: Moroccan Tagine, Moroccan Crepes and Cookie
address: Marrakech, Morocco¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 1.75 hours ¬∑ Hosted in French, Arabic, and English
act_int: FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME FOR ANY TIME YOU WISH.Immerse yourself in Moroccan culture by discovering our cuisine, it is not only a cooking class, it is also a way to share our traditions and get involved in this culture while learning the art of cooking Moroccan.The menu consists of three different dishes (a Tagine, Moroccan bread and sesame cookies).- Tajine of meat and various vegetables, or otherwise Tajine of meat and dried fruits. You choose.- Sesame cookie.- Moroccan Crepes (Msemen).+ you will receive the ingredient list just after booking with all details on airbnb, feel free to ask me if you have any questions.+ I would share my homemade preserved lemon recipe if you are interested.* Vegetarian / vegan / gluten-free alternatives possible.* Please book according to the number of participants.* The list of ingredients will be shared is for 2 to 3 person.* If you wish to book for a private group, don't hesitate to write me, I will be happy to organize it for you.+ see my Instagram: how to With Najla, Dont hesitate to share with me the pictures of the dishes we will cook  on Instagram :)
about_author: My name is Najlae and I am a Moroccan chef. I lived my childhood in Marrakesh, I grew up in a Moroccan house with my big family, I took my bachelor's degree in science, I continued my studies in national and international cuisine for two years, I worked in several establishments and now I work individually, my own project of Moroccan cuisine.let's join me in my kitchen, in my house I would like to share with you the pleasure of cooking, as well as the Entertainment that will allow you to get acquainted with our rich and traditional cuisine, spices and many products used in this area as well .Here is the page of the experience I have as a normal person, I often reread the comments:https://www.airbnb.fr/experiences/481227

title: The Ultimate Cookie Class
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Love cookies? Can't decide between crunchy or chewy, soft or crispy? Choc chips, peanut butter swirl or icing and sprinkles? Well we've got you covered - we'll dive in to the world of cookies, whizzing through cookie theory, proper technique, and dozens of ideas for variations, as well as FOUR different types of cookies, plus common cookie-making mistakes and how to avoid them - all in one hour class! You can bake along, and by the end of the class, you'll have dozens of delicious cookies coming out of the oven (don't worry, they freeze well if you can't eat them all...!) This is an experience personalized to you - you get to choose the styles and flavours of all the cookies we make. So strap on your seatbelts, this is a jam-packed, chocolate-chunked, caramel-filled cookie adventure. Perfect for kids, families, couples, and solo cookie-lovers of all baking levels.P.S. We have LOTS of availability! If you don't see the date or time that works for you, just send us a message, we're always happy to accommodate - and if you'd like a bigger group than the max listed here, that's fine too, just drop us a line!
about_author: Hello dessert lovers! I'm Jess, a lifelong baker, founder of a baking school, host of a TV baking show, and author of a cookbook!! As you can probably tell, I'm slightly sugar obsessed, and I LOVE sharing this passion with others, and helping everyone see how easy baking can be! Yes, It's a science, but it's so much simpler than you think! Join me and my lovely team of teachers to learn simple, impressive, fingerlickin' delicious desserts, I promise I can teach anyone to become a dessertmaster!

address: Nice, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences

act_int: Explore French flavors with a French chef and learn how to make the best authentic French toast recipe ever.In this interactive online experience, I‚Äôll teach you how to make French toasts. Once I walk you through this recipe step by step, you‚Äôll be able to re-create this dish to wow your family and friends in the future. We‚Äôll go through the basic recipes, and we will improve the standard dish to give it your own unique (and soon-to-be signature!) flavor.This experience is perfect for team-building or events like anniversary,  bachelorette party ...Fell free to contact me for a new date or time. You could do this recipe in family,  with friends, or even for a team-building event. It's a good anniversary present. It's a way to spend some time with family or friends who are living far from you. Not only that, but it's having a fun moment with people you never met before from all around the world. Furthermore, it's a way to not have a boring day!I hope that you will join me on my best authentic french toast recipe with bananas  and after this cooking class you're willing to do my other cooking classes experiences like the authentic French Baguette, Onion soup, Ratatouille, Magic cake, tarte tatin French Quiche, French crepe, and my foolproof Macaron..

title: Decadent No Bake Chocolate E'clair Cake. Only 5 ingredients!
address: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Let's come together from kitchens across the world to make this yummy dessert reminiscent of an e'clair... Creamy, sweet, layers of pudding and rich chocolate. Who could resist? Only 5 ingredients are needed! This is a no bake cake. No oven or stove are needed to make this recipe. If you are new to baking or need to improve your skills...this is the recipe for you. If you have previous experience in the kitchen, but just need another good recipe to try out or add to your file..this recipe is for you too. If you are looking for a family friendly class, that would be great to do with children...this is the recipe for you(remember--no stove or oven is needed). By the end of class you will have an amazing dessert. But don't take my word for it..Sign up now!
about_author: Hello. My name is Lisa. Welcome to my kitchen.  I can‚Äôt wait to share some of the tips I‚Äôve picked up along my culinary journey.My experience started out as a child alongside my Grandmother who was the best Southern cook. My curiosity to learn more led me to take Food Science in College and a eagerness to discover new cultures and cuisines ignited my wanderlust to travel and take cooking classes abroad. I saw the power of food and how it could turn strangers into friends within kitchens and across tables. Over the years I‚Äôve shared my passion with others as a culinary instructor, foodpreneur and blogger.With the pandemic, cooking together and in person wasn‚Äôt possible, so I made my experiences virtual. Each class provides you the opportunity to build confidence and improve cooking skills. So what are you waiting for? Sign up now~

title: Baklava Cooking Class with Turkish Mom
address: ƒ∞stanbul, Turkey¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Hello,Welcome to home Baklava (turkish layered pastry dessert) Cooking Class.I am conducting this experience together with my mom. She is master in cooking turkish dishes since her childhood.In this class, you'll be learning online how to cook easy and delicious Baklava (turkish layered pastry dessert). We will show you step by step every detail. No previous experience needed. Anyone can easily do at home.Ingredients can be found easily in every grocery shop.This online experience offers a UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY to submerge yourself in the authentic TURKISH FOOD culture. To Provide Delicious Turkish Food Which brings a SMILE ON THE FACE is my MISSION that i pursue.
about_author: I live with my mom.We are passionate about food cooking especially our turkish local food.It's always good for visitors to have a local host to offer cooking classes and also give some advice about local food.We enjoy getting to know people and learning about different cultures.We are excited to invite you to taste our traditional food at our home & act like a local. You will be really close to the turkish atmosphere.

title: Bake with a Chef - Chunky New York Style Cookies
address: Madrid, Spain¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: Welcome to the sweetest Airbnb Online Experience!Through this experience, you will learn to bake the famous New York Style Cookies.  It will last an hour.  I will be explaining the process, answering all your questions, and we will make them together from scratch.  The experience will be guided in English and/or Spanish.  This is a FAMILY FRIENDLY experience, if you'd like your kids to tag along with you and share with them this activity, they are more than welcome at no additional cost =)Please note:You're welcome to bake along, or you can just watch, take notes, and bake later!We have PLENTY of availability during weekends! If you don't see the date or time that works for you, just send me a message, and I'll be always happy to accommodate - and if you'd like a bigger group than the max listed here, that's fine too, just drop us a line!I am very excited of getting to know each other, and share with you an hour of joy and therapeutic baking =)My work on insta @chefnaymamazloum DM me for other online courses.
about_author: Hey there!! My name is Nayma, and I am a certified Pastry Chef.  I have been baking and building international experience for 10+ years now.  I followed the passion of my grandmother for baking, and I have nourished it by studying baking arts at Le Cordon Bleu Paris, and specializing in American Desserts and Cake Decoration at The French Pastry School Chicago.Check my insta @chefnaymamazloum to see more of my work =)I have hosted baking classes at home for adults and kids, and now that I have the chance to do it online, I would love to meet you and share my passion with you!Also, I have been part of the Airbnb community for 6 years, as an Airbnb Stay Host, which has opened wonderful doors for me since I have been able to meet amazing people from all over the world.

title: Baking Irish Scones and Brown Bread Zoom
address: Galway, Ireland¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: We will bake fruit, lavender and berry scones, and spelt or brown bread. I will bake on my side of the video, while the guest will bake at the same time at their place. Im going to do all the baking step by step with them.I believe in the hands on experience for my guests - from handling ingredients to kneading dough. It isn't all about the cooking, I share lots of tips from my experience over the years.I love to see the faces full of excitement and joy at the sight of the end product - freshly baked scones and bread.And best of all we have lots of fun.Other things to noteJust sign in and let me entertain and educate at the same time.... it will be fun !!!
about_author: I am a restauranteur with  busy cafe and luckily work close to home.  I live in an area of natural beauty and really enjoy walking, hiking and exploring.  I look forward to sharing my knowledge of local history with my guests. I love the natural cycle of my garden and while away many happy hours there.  I do hope my guests will enjoy its beauty. I enjoy entertaining, meeting new people as well as yoga, dancing and the outdoors.  I hope you will like in the West half a much as I do. x Kate

title: Champion Tiramisu and funny Italian gestures
address: Olgiate Comasco, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Tiramis√π lovers, if you can't go to Italy, Italy and I come to you! Are you ready to make your best tiramisu ever?- just 6 ingredients- no-baking - very easy to make It won't be a lesson where I speak and you listen, but we will be friends having fun together cooking something delicious!We will make online together the perfect Italian tiramisu worth winning the world championship! I will give some tips to make your masterpiece and you will be surprised about how easy it is to prepare the most known Italian dessert in the world. The list of ingredients is very short and easy to find.And why not learning some Italian gestures too? They are very funny and you can use them in your everyday life! You can look at my highlight stories in my Instagram @impastamisu to see how much fun we have together!According to guests' feedback, my experience is a great way to reconnect with family, friends, or for a celebration! Let me know what I can do to make your birthday/anniversary or other celebrations special!Can't wait to meet you all online!P.S. With the doses I gave you, you will make a tiramisu for 3 people. If you want to make a bigger one, use 16 ounces (500 gr) mascarpone and 3 eggs.
about_author: Ciao! I am Silvia, born and raised in Italy. Tiramis√π is my favourite dessert and I have been doing it for more than 20 years. I learnt it from my mamma and I have a true passion for it. I attended Tiramis√π World Cup (yes, it exists in italy!) in 2021, and I am training for next competition.

title: Turkish ravioli - Mantƒ± with Turkish mom
address: ƒ∞stanbul, Turkey¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Hello,Welcome to home Mantƒ± (turkish ravioli) Cooking Class.I am conducting this experience together with my mom. She is master in cooking turkish dishes since her childhood.In this class, you'll be learning online how to cook easy, healthy and delicious Manti (turkish ravioli). We will show you step by step every detail. No previous experience needed. Anyone can easily do at home.Ingredients can be found easily in every grocery shop.This online experience offers a UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY to submerge yourself in the authentic TURKISH FOOD culture. To Provide Healthy Food Which brings a SMILE ON THE FACE is my MISSION that i pursue.We have 2 more cooking classes. You are always welcome.G√∂zleme Cooking Classhttps://www.airbnb.com.tr/experiences/2421098Baklava Cooking Classhttps://www.airbnb.com.tr/experiences/2630340
about_author: I live with my mom.We are passionate about food cooking especially our turkish local food.It's always good for visitors to have a local host to offer cooking classes and also give some advice about local food.We enjoy getting to know people and learning about different cultures.We are excited to invite you to taste our traditional food at our home & act like a local. You will be really close to the turkish atmosphere.We have 2 more cooking classes other than Manti Cooking Class.You are always welcome.G√∂zleme Cooking Classhttps://www.airbnb.com.tr/experiences/2421098Baklava Cooking Classhttps://www.airbnb.com.tr/experiences/2630340
comment_all: [{'time': 'October 2021', 'name': 'Natalia', 'comment': 'You can‚Äôt get more authentic Turkish food than this experience! The result was beyond delicious! Great mother & son team with great camera set up so you can see everything! Great communication before the class. Can‚Äôt wait for my next class!!! Highly recommend!', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'August 2021', 'name': 'Ploy', 'comment': 'Burak and his mom were so great! I had a great time with them making manti. It‚Äôs the labor of love to make manti at home but so worth it. Manti came out delicious.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'August 2021', 'name': 'Lisa', 'comment': 'Really had a fun time with this class.  The instruction is superb and it‚Äôs fun to be taught by an expert home cook. Plus you get an inside look at living in Turkey. I look forward to another class and highly recommend this one.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'August 2021', 'name': 'Lydia', 'comment': 'Burak and his Mom take you through a Turkish delight. This time we made Manti. They turned out yummy. They are time intensive delights, so have a friend join you! A fun and tasty experience.', 'reply': {}}]

title: The Art of Turkish Breakfast with Burak
address: Istanbul, Turkey¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Immerse yourself in the rich flavors of Turkish cuisine, all from the comfort of your home! We'll explore Turkish food culture and history, and all the methods and ingredients that make this cuisine so special with simple but tasty dishes. After the introduction, you‚Äôll have the chance to see the ingredients, plates, and utensils that we have on our family table and you will get to know the recipes and we will prepare a Turkish Coffee.Then, we will cook Murtaƒüa (a dish from my hometown called Van). Later on, we will cook Menemen (Turkish Omelet). Both are quite easy to prepare so no need for expert skills!After our experience, you will have knowledge on:- Turkish Family Breakfast Culture- Turkish Coffee Ritual and History- Murtaƒüa Cooking- Menemen CookingExtras: After booking, you will receive:- Turkish Bubble Bread recipe- Kaymak (Clotted Cream) recipe- Map of Turkish Breakfast Products- List of Breakfast ingredients and the location of Turkish markets in your city This Experience is great for team-building. Enjoyed by MIT, Netflix, Spotify, and many friends & families.FAQ:If you can't find a time/date on my calendar, please write so I will make it available for you.Is your group larger than my listed max group size for private groups? Send me a message. This is an online experience but can be hosted in Istanbul as well.See you in my kitchen!Burak
about_author: Hey, everyone! I‚Äôm Burak and I have been organizing 8 different in-person Experiences in Istanbul since March 2019 as a full-time Experiences Host. I am currently Airbnb Experiences Istanbul Community Leader. I was born in the Eastern Anatolian part of Turkey, Van: A city of cats, lakes, mountains, and breakfast. Since my childhood, breakfast has been an important part of my life, especially our family breakfast. And with this experience, I wanted to introduce you to Homemade Turkish Breakfast from my kitchen.I have a passion for food and its power to connect people, and Turkish culture is a reflection of that power. Check out reviews for the in-person Experiences I host here: airbnb.com/istanbulexperiencesOfficial IG Account: instagram.com/istanbulexperiencesFrom Istanbul with love!Burak

title: Prepare The Delicious Chocotorta
address: Buenos Aires, Argentina¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Make your own Birthday cake! :)The delicious and sugary  chocotorta!the tasty mix of chocolate cookies and cream cheese became will do a feast in your mouth!For about 45  minutes you will learn alternative fillings! It¬¥s easy, fast and a non baking recipe!
about_author: Hi, Im Pablo! I have been working in tourism for more than 15 years. I'm a passionate about my country! Argentina is a great Country with lot of  things to do and learn about!I'm really fond of gastronomy, culture and history. I'm always in the search of new things to do in my beautiful city of Buenos Aires or in the countryside! I do not work on my own, Instead I work along with  mates that share my passion too!!

title: Family fun Italian tiramis√π cookalong
address: Venice, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: This experience is great for families, for young for old, for kids from 2 to 99 years old!Book it now to bring the magic feeling of our cooking experience to your home... and enjoy a fun activity with the whole family!!!From the comfort of your home join us in a fun experience ideal for the whole family and learn how to prepare a very typical and famous Italian dessert: tiramis√π!We will start with a short presentation, then we will arrange the ingredients and cook together delicious tiramisu'!Your family or group will prepare the very Italian tiramisu' dessert (traditionally invented in Treviso in 1969, our home town). Together we will prepare tiramisu' in 2 delicious different ways, the classic one and a fresh and fruity version! I will be here to help you and answer all your questions about tiramisu and Italian food and culture!Booking is per household (1 booking = 1 parent + kids). No need to add your kids to the reservation.After booking we will send you the link to connect to the experience, and the list of ingredients needed.You will also receive the link to download a booklet with these and more of our favorite Italian recipes to surprise your guests at home!I am happy to host this experience for private birthday parties, gatherings, celebrations or corporate events. Just message me and I will be delighted to set up the perfect experience for you!
about_author: I am a proud mum, a globetrotter, and nutrition student, I love food and to cook natural and traditional dishes for my family. With my husband Carlo we founded Yellowboot.it offering experience travels in Italy. I have cooking in my blood as my great grandad was a chef at weddings, my grandma taught me all traditional recipes I know, and my family owns an osteria in the Prosecco Hills: Antica Osteria di via Brandolini, where I help regularly in the kitchen (I also met my husband there)! My husband Carlo, a chef & foody, and I are passionate about making you learn, cook, and discover traditional Italian food!

title: Mochi, Ice Cream Mochi & Mochi Donuts
address: San Leandro, California, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: In this fun class, you will learn how to make 3 different mochi dishes! We will start class by making mochi filled with red bean (or nutella if you prefer). Also filled with strawberry (or your choice of fresh fruit, this is optional).Second, we will make mochi ice cream, which you can eat or freeze and enjoy later on.Finally, we will end class by making your choice of delicious chocolate, matcha, or vanilla-glazed baked mochi donuts!You will get to eat fresh and tasty mochi, and learn how to easily make delicious mochi for your family and friends.Other things to note:Please make sure to buy all ingredients before class.
about_author: I have always been passionate about teaching guests how to make delicious dishes from my Japanese heritage. I come from Fukushima, Japan and learned how to cook traditional Japanese meals and desserts from my mother. I learned how to make mochi many years ago with my friends, and have been making it for more than 20 years.We have 293 positive reviews on our original Airbnb Mochi Experience: https://www.airbnb.com/experiences/99509I am excited to share our mochi-making skills with you, and delighted to keep this tradition alive. We are both very passionate about mochi and now teach classes online. I do mochi online team building for Facebook, Google, and other companies throughout the Bay Area. Please contact me to book a team building event

title: Luxurious French profiteroles & eclairs
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Does the idea of crisp, fluffy pastry, luxurious vanilla whipped cream, and decadent chocolate ganache make your mouth water? Of course it does!! Join us for one of our most popular baking classes - chocolate eclairs and profiteroles. You'll be amazed at how easy this gorgeous french dessert is, and how incredibly impressive it looks. We;ll make absolutely everything from scratch, and answer any questions you have along the way. To finish up, we'll chat all about other options for flavours and fillings, and some easy food styling tips for beautiful photos. Note: we take no responsibility for how dangerously delicious the finished product will be, bake at your own risk....!!
about_author: Hello dessert lovers! I'm Jess, a lifelong baker, founder of a baking school, host of a TV baking show, and author of a cookbook!! As you can probably tell, I'm slightly sugar obsessed, and I LOVE sharing this passion with others, and helping everyone see how easy baking can be! Yes, It's a science, but it's so much simpler than you think! Join me and my lovely team of teachers to learn simple, impressive, fingerlickin' delicious desserts, I promise I can teach anyone to become a dessertmaster!

title: Crusty French Baguette Recipe
address: Nice, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and French
act_int: In this interactive online cooking experience, I will teach you how to make an Authentic Crusty French Baguette and I will teach you all my chef tricks in this easy bread recipe to help you in this process. It's a great class to do as a team-building event,  also perfect for an anniversary, family events,  a bachelorette party, or just for cooking with friends ;-)Reduction for group available Feel free to ask for any date and time which will fill you better.I will show you how to make one of the most important foodstuffs in France, the bread but also how you could use the traditional recipe to make your very special bread which could be your signature.  Bread in France is in every meal. For breakfast, brunch, lunch or diner.You could sweetly eat bread, with chocolate, or in a savoury one, with ham or for a sandwich.I will also teach you how to make a typical french sandwich. I will teach you the classical recipe of it, but I will also give you tips to make other bread. Cooking is very easy, and I will teach you in a very easy way but more of that in a delicious way.How to make an authentic and crusty baguette from a French chef is a great class to do as a team-building event,  also perfect for an anniversary, family events,  a bachelorette party, or just for cooking with friends ;-)
about_author: Over the past 2 years, I have welcomed many people around my table for a modern French breakfast or brunch and have received thousands of 5 stars reviews. Some of my guests have told me that I need a TV show to learn about my French cooking. Guess what, Airbnb has created the opportunity to do better: I bring you into my kitchen to learn my delicate pastries through the online experience.

title: Cupcake like a Pro [Secrets Revealed]
address: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Hello. Welcome to my kitchen. My name is Lisa. Many aren‚Äôt aware that bakery cupcake‚Äôs  are merely doctored mixes. I‚Äôm going to teach you how to make bakery quality cupcakes in the comfort of your home. We will first start out by making cupcake batter.  I will teach techniques that will assure moist and fluffy cupcakes and provide tips on how to turn one mix into a variety of other flavors and themes with add ins from your fridge or pantry. While our cupcakes bake and then cool, we will prep our frosting, piping bags and practice basic techniques to style them. Once cooled, I will walk you through frosting and decorating your cupcakes.
about_author: Hello. My name is Lisa. Welcome to my kitchen.  I can‚Äôt wait to share some of the tips I‚Äôve picked up along my culinary journey.My experience started out as a child alongside my Grandmother who was the best Southern cook. My curiosity to learn more led me to take Food Science in College and a eagerness to discover new cultures and cuisines ignited my wanderlust to travel and take cooking classes abroad. I saw the power of food and how it could turn strangers into friends within kitchens and across tables. Over the years I‚Äôve shared my passion with others as a culinary instructor, foodpreneur and blogger.With the pandemic, cooking together and in person wasn‚Äôt possible, so I made my experiences virtual. Each class provides you the opportunity to build confidence and improve cooking skills. So what are you waiting for? Sign up now~

Plus the secrets revealed easily saved me that in store or bakery bought cupcakes! title: Sicilian almond pastries and pudding
address: Palermo, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: PERFECT EXPERIENCE FOR TEAM BUILDING AND FOR PRIVATE GROUP . AWARDS AND CHALLENGE AWAIT YOU.I HOST UNTIL 70 PEOPLEAre you ready?We will prepare the typical Sicilian almond pastries and the wonderful pudding with almond milk. (There is also the variant with  cow's milk). Almond in Sicily, as well as pistachio, are important and known all over the world for quality. They are the basis of our tradition and We usually prepare many almond and pistachio desserts.   Crispy on the outside and chewy on the inside, they could be stored for a long time in the tin and they were always good. The sicilian pudding with almond milk flavored with lemon and cinnamon  was the dessert of Sunday.  A dessert that adults and children liked so much. The pudding 's name in italian language is "biancomangiare".What are we waiting for? Let's start
about_author: My work and my hobby is all around the food. I am graduated in law, but 10 years ago I chose my way. I menage my farmhouse restaurant born 32 years ago together with my family, I produce pasta with Sicilian grains and for many years I have hosted people from all over the world to cook together and share family recipes. Since I was a child I can smell the dishes prepared by my mom and my granny. I've been breathing food, tradition and nature since I was born. I've been talking and hearing about food since I've been in bands. I organize the catering on my restaurant, I love to stay in contact wtih my clients and I love cooking.

title: Italian Ice Cream what a passion
address: Manarola, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in Italian and English
act_int: What do you think of Italian Gelato? Do you like?Find out how to create in a simple and fast way, directly from home, what makes everyone happy, young and old: ice cream.We will use simple ingredients and, step by step, we will prepare together the base with which to create different flavors.Chocolate, Pistachio, Amarena, Stracciatella, Fiordilatte, which one do you like?Perfect experience for everyone, even for team building.Once you have booked the experience you will receive a message with the list of ingredients and tools you need.If you do not find availability contact me.Important! A RESERVATION FOR EVERY PERSON.See you soon then, I'll wait for you here in my kitchen in Italy :-)
about_author: Hi, I'm Maria.Nicola and I were the first hosts of the Airbnb Experience in the Cinque Terre.We have welcomed more than 2500 guests on our boat and have received thousands of 5 star reviews.We spent wonderful days with our guests between the sea, breathtaking views, wine, Spritz at sunset and the preparation of typical Italian dishes on board.The passion for Italian cuisine has been handed down for generations in my family and I have also brought this passion to the sea by boat.But the kitchen tastes of home, love, family and therefore I am happy to welcome you to my home for this new adventure.

She is friendly & I am sure anyone who books a session with her will have  a fruitful session .', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'May 2021', 'name': 'Ryan', 'comment': "Maria was an excellent host and instructor.  I went into the experience knowing that I love Gelato and Maria's recipes did not disappoint! title: Sweet Treats and Sleight of Hand
address: Johannesburg, South Africa¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: **Recommended by BuzzFeed**Howzit! Dumela! Sawubona!...and Welcome to South Africa!This experience is great fun for individuals, couples or groups. We have hosted numerous birthday parties, school events and team builders for companies. We can host up to 30 guests at a time. If the date or time that you are looking for is not available please feel free to contact me for a new date. Guests can choose either to make the dessert with us, or watch the class and magic show. Alternative "sweet treat options" can be are offered for any dietary restrictions, please contact us beforehand for any accommodations . First, we will start by teaching you how to make a delicious Peppermint Crisp Tart using our family recipe. The dessert is quick, easy and bake free! Then you will be entertained with a super fun, interactive magic show. After the experience, all guests will receive a surprise gift from us.We truly believe in connecting with people and can‚Äôt wait to meet you!Other things to note*This recipe is easily adaptable. If you cannot find the exact ingredients, please contact us for information on substitutes and we will gladly assist you.*Please contact us directly should you need to book a group larger than 10 people.
about_author: We have both worked on Disney Cruise Line over the past 10 years in the Entertainment department. Chad has been professionally performing magic for over 10 years for all ages at corporate companies, cruise ships, hotels and private parties.Natalie is now a meditation teacher and currently completing her yoga studies. Although we love to travel and meet new people, South Africa is where we call home. We are so proud of our country and heritage and cant wait to share some of our traditional family recipes. We also have a Youtube channel where we share tips and ideas on things for couples to do and date night experiences.

title: Bake Pastel de Nata with a Local
address: MAIA-PORTO, Portugal¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in Portuguese, English, and Spanish
act_int: We will take this online class directly from my kitchen, an excellent opportunity to emerge in Portuguese culture and discover some secrets. It will be a unique and fantastic experience !!First I will introduce myself and talk a little about how this wonderful adventure of sharing the culture and gastronomy of my country started, then we start to cook the best pastel de nata in the world! A unique, traditional and familiar recipe. Flavors that remind me of my childhood. The pastel de nata that you will learn with me is my grandmother's recipe, at the age of 6 I already helped her to make this magnificent recipe. Today you will have the chance to bake, taste and later share it with someone special. Passing these traditions on to other people has become a passion for me! I will give you the confidence to prepare the best homemade puffpatry and you will roooock!! At the end i share with you my result !Other observationsPlease, before the experimence, make sure you have all the ingredients and quantities ready so that we can start all together. Ready to make the best pastel de nata in the world?
about_author: Hello!! I'm In√™s from the south of Portugal but I've been living in Porto for 7 years. I am passionate about showing people the best we have in our country. I love to cook, especially sweets, cakes. As a foodie, who traveled the world in search of the best dishes and desserts, I can assure you that Portugal is the perfect country to taste the best desserts in the world.This is a very special recipe for me, it is my grandmother's recipe. when i was 6 years old i started helping her to prepare one of the most famous pastries in the world! Today I share it with you so you can share it with everyone you love. In addition to being a homemade and delicious recipe, it has a lot of history, love and magical moments that I will also share with you.Culture, history, passion and memories are all that you can enjoy in this fantastic experience!Excitedto meet you! xx In√™s

title: Virtual Persian Cooking Class
address: Milan, Italy¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 75 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and French
act_int: I would love to invite you to discover my recipes and learn to make them since Mastering Persian cooking gives you the power to make literally anyone happy to enjoy something so tasty and different because of mixing in a new way the ingredients together.I enjoy teaching people to cook because I believe sharing this knowledge is an act of love.In this course we are going to cook at the same time. First, we start to treat the meat before cooking it. And then, as a side, I will teach you the famous Iranian rice coming with Tah-deeg, which literally means "bottom of the pot" in Persian. It refers to a golden crust, pan-fried.During the lesson I‚Äôll keep interacting with you and I‚Äôll keep an eye on each step you should accomplish. You could although ask questions to clarify your doubts.At the end of the lesson you will have a meal ready for 2-5 people to enjoy even that same evening for dinner. So your beloved can appreciate flavours from Persia: the country of a ‚ÄúThousand and One Nights‚Äù.I will send you the recipe by video later so you won‚Äôt have to take any note and you‚Äôll be free to enjoy the class entirely and get to know each other.Your dinner guests will be so pleased that I‚Äôm sure this is going be the first step of a long path together.
about_author: Hi my name is sarah. I‚Äôm a Persian who grew up in a country with 3000 years of histories and poetries. I learnt to cook thanks to my grandma who taught me all the little know_how to cook delicious Persian dishes.As a teenager I remember every time I came home from school I could feel the smell of saffron and steam rice that run everywhere in my house.Seeing my grandmother wile she was cooking and whispering one of the famous Persian poem is one of my favorite memories. That is exactly the way that I learnt cooking naturally ,  just by being close to my grandma in the kitchen.After I left Iran to move to France I‚Äôve discovered  that my patience for art is as strong as  my love for cooking. Now I can present my self as an artist and chef. For me the most exciting part of cooking is a nice presentation of a colour full dish to my g

title: G√∂zleme Cooking Class with Turkish Mom
address: ƒ∞stanbul, Turkey¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Hello,Welcome to home G√∂zleme Cooking Class.I am conducting this experience together with my mom. She is master in cooking turkish dishes since her childhood.Easiest Recipe that I loved to prepare is G√∂zleme (turkish stuffed flatbread).  In this class, you'll be learning online how to cook easy, healthy and delicious G√∂zleme (turkish stuffed flatbread). We will show you step by step every detail. No previous experience needed. Anyone can easily do at home. Ingredients can be found easily in every grocery shop.This online experience offers a UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY to submerge yourself in the authentic TURKISH FOOD culture. To Provide Healthy Food Which brings a SMILE ON THE FACE is my MISSION that i pursue.
about_author: I live with my mom.We are passionate about food cooking especially our turkish local foodIt's always good for visitors to have a local host to offer cooking classes and also give some advice about local food.We enjoy getting to know people and learning about different cultures.We are excited to invite you to taste our traditional food at our home & act like a local. You will be really close to the turkish atmosphere.

title: Paris - Brest french baking class
address: Paris, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Join our French baking class in the heart of Paris from anywhere in the worldMadame, Monsieur,You will travel to Paris in first class to our baking activity For one hour and a half, you will learn everything about ‚ÄúLa P√¢te √† Choux‚Äù which is the base for several French dessertsDid you know that this dough dates from the XVI century?We will start from ‚Äúla Mise en place‚Äù then we will travel together over centuries to discover all the extraordinary  pastries that you will be able to do after this classCome and join us, on this unique online French baking class which it will be a hand-on activity for making Le Paris-Brest, shaped like a bicycle wheel and garnished with a cr√®me mousseline au pralin√©eLe Paris-Brest pay a tribute to the Paris-Brest-Paris cycling race  We wish you a pleasant experience & Bonne d√©gustationThis French baking class it is ideal for private booking such as family/friends gathering as well as anniversaries, corporate groups and private events---If you are looking for an specific date & timeorIf you have any question, please do not hesitate to contact
about_author: Madame, Monsieur, Bonjour & Bienvenue √† Aten-Te Aute in ParisWe are Gaby & Carlos siblings with a common passion, FOOD Since 2016, we have developed joyful French baking & cooking classes for families.A dynamic, fun and easy way to approach challenging recipes in a shared onsite & online experience that promises a unique hands-on participation. Our goal is to simply embellish this idea and shared passion for cooking by giving to families tools to learn so that in the near future they can re-create those recipes at any time, for which we are certain you will end up having your own Petit Chef! at home :)We invite you to have a look into the different French baking experiences that we offer, if you have any question do not hesitate to contact.Wishing you bright days and lot of funHugs from Paris

title: Chouquete french baking class from Paris
address: Paris, France¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Join our French baking class in the heart of Paris from anywhere in the worldMadame, Monsieur,You will travel to Paris in first class to our baking experienceFor one hour and a half, you will learn everything about ‚ÄúLa P√¢te √† Choux‚Äù which is the base for several French desserts-> Do you know that this dough dates from the XVI century?We will start from ‚Äúla Mise en place‚Äù then we will travel together over centuries to discover all the extraordinary  pastries that you will be able to do after this classCome and join us, on this unique online French baking class which it will be a hand-on activity for making Chouquettes, being one of the most popular pastries in France for breakfastWe wish you a pleasant experience & Bonne d√©gustationThis French baking class it is ideal for private booking such as family/friends gathering as well as anniversaries, corporate groups and private eventsPlease note: One booking = one recipe = one camera = max 1 person---ONLY for ‚ÄúPrivate bookings‚Äù If you have booked a private session and would like to try a different online baking class, you may choose one of the following options:-	A | up to 20 guests: Chouquette (sweet pastry) & cocktail-	B | up to 20 guests: Goug√®re (savoury pastry) & cocktail-	C | up to 4 guests: 2 hours - Macaron (level difficult)
about_author: Madame, Monsieur, Bonjour & Bienvenue √† Aten-Te Aute in ParisWe are Gaby & Carlos siblings with a common passion, FOOD Since 2016, we have developed joyful French baking & cooking classes for families.A dynamic, fun and easy way to approach challenging recipes in a shared onsite & online experience that promises a unique hands-on participation. Our goal is to simply embellish this idea and shared passion for cooking by giving to families tools to learn so that in the near future they can re-create those recipes at any time, for which we are certain you will end up having your own Petit Chef! at home :)We invite you to have a look into the different French baking experiences that we offer, if you have any question do not hesitate to contact.Wishing you bright days and lot of funHugs from Paris Gaby & Carlos @atenteaute

title: The Flour Hour
address: Portland, Oregon, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: We'll cover the history of flour milling in-depth and I'll clearly show how we got to the flour market available to us today. Then we'll delve into our current flour choices on the market and take a look at food labels from various markets together. I will also talk about the nutrition of flour and how to make choices that account for baking qualities + best nourishment. My goal is for you to find the flour you want for your perfect bread, so my job is to teach you what is available and how to make your own choices, rather than just tell you what to buy. I have a home mill, so we'll briefly discuss home milling and how it's different than buying already milled flour. I will leave time at the end of class to delve into questions I may not have covered, or ones that arise in the process of our time together.Other things to noteIt's not necessary to have prior baking experience to take this class; come with your flour questions or concerns, however big or small. If I don't know, I'll help you find out!
about_author: I am a longtime food writer, and I've spent the past decade baking at home and learning the ins and outs of our flour choices. I have taught an in-person Airbnb Experience for the past two years, and many of my past students have commented that learning about flour choices was one of the most valuable things they took away from my class. I have distilled this information into an hour so you can cut through the confusing choices to make the best bread possible.
comment_all: [{'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Dawn', 'comment': 'wow! What another delightful and thougt provoking experience! As someone who loved how MIchael Pollan explores the history of humanity via food, I was eager to take this course. It did not disappoint! I learned so much and Adrian made the science behind one of our favorite carbs so interesting and intriguing. I recommend this class to all age groups! What a treat! I am still thinking about what I learned regarding the ancient Egyptians and just how difficult is truly is to make flour. We take so many things for granted. The class helps build a more thorough global perspective and we are all so connected by flour in one way or another.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'December 2021', 'name': 'Cristina', 'comment': 'What a fantastic hour! Adrian is an incredible storyteller. Her experience is fun,  informative, and useful. She has a gift for condensing difficult concepts and making them accessible in an exciting way. I recommend it if you want to know more about flour.', 'reply': {}}, {'time': 'November 2021', 'name': 'Timmy', 'comment': 'Great! title: Vegan Indonesian Street-Food Desserts
address: Denpasar, Indonesia¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Indonesian Street-Food Desserts or Jajanan Pasar are one of South East Asia culinary surprises. With thousands of islands, all contributing to Indonesia's diverse cuisine including the desserts. They are delight to see, smell and taste. Most of them are VEGAN (V), some are GLUTEN FREE (GF), made with traditional method, many involving grated coconut, coconut milk and palm sugar, they're usually fried, steamed or boiled.This experience is perfect for Team Building or Family Gathering, contact us for PRIVATE GROUP.Below are the upcoming schedule of different desserts making classes :01-06 MarRujak - Fruit Salad (GF, V)Pisang Rai - Banana Cake with grated Coconut (V)08-13 MarBubur Sumsum - Sweet Porridge (GF, V)Sagon & Wingko - Coconut Cake (GF)15-20 MarJavanese Jamu - Indonesian Tonic Drink (V, GF)Kue Lupis - Sticky Rice Triangle (V, GF)*Note: only if you can get banana leaf22-27 MarPisang Goreng - Fried Banana (V)Kue Dadar Gulung Pandan - Pandan Rolled Pancake (V)29 Mar-03 AprOnde-Onde - Sesame Mungbean Balls (V, GF)05-10 AprRujak - Fruit Salad (GF, V)Pisang Rai - Banana Cake with grated Coconut (V)The schedule will be regularly updated, check with us the next ones.Upon booking, you will receive a message with list of ingredients.Can't wait to make the Indonesian desserts with you!
about_author: Halo!This is Irene from Bali, Indonesia. I've been a co-host of my parents' airbnb experience "Easy Balinese Indonesian Cooking" and heard all about the great fun they are having during the classes, not to mention how happy the participants with the result.Having that as the background, and how I love making sweets since I was little, I'd like to take part of sharing our tasty Traditional Indonesian Street-Food Desserts to airbnb community.I am a university student on my last semester, my subject is visual communication design, cooking/baking has always been my passion and I am glad I can share to you all these delights of our desserts. Very looking forward to spend time making Indonesian desserts with you.

title: Puerto Rico Holiday Cocktail and Pastelillos
address: New York, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 60 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English and Spanish
act_int: Imagine taking a virtual trip to La Isla del Encanto (Puerto Rico). We can take you there with a little bit of Puerto Rican history, coquito, and pastelillos! Coquito and pastelillos (also known as empanadas) are a staple for Puerto Ricans. Coquito is usually made during the holidays much like eggnog but why not drink it year round? Pastelillos is everyone's favorite gustito (appetizer) all year round.In our LIVE class, we will teach you how to make a very popular dessert cocktail in Puerto Rico known as Coquito. Our cocktail has been acclaimed in the Miami Herald Newspaper and loved by The Sporkful with Dan Pashman Podcast.Then we will make savory and sweet baked pastelillos; one with cheddar cheese filling and another with berry compote (berry compote will be made from scratch) Then we conclude the class with a Q & A, dancing, and lots of giggles.This experience is great for private groups looking to gather virtually over the Holidays!  Whether you're celebrating with family, friends, or coworkers, I look forward to hosting your holiday get-togetherPuerto Ricans are diverse people, and our food speaks for itself. Our combination of flavors, spices, and passion will make you want to dance and yell WEPA!
about_author: I'm a proud owner of Coqui the Chef, a social enterprise.  I reinvent my Abuelita recipes and take care of my people through food. I enjoy teaching the importance of culinary culture and diversity.  This stems from my love for all types of food from its history and tradition. I find that culinary experiences don't only happen in restaurants! They can happen anywhere.

title: Greek Spanakopita & Brie Cheese Twist
address: Baltimore, Maryland, United States¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Welcome to my "Kitchen Of Life" Join me Chef Steff as we travel through Greece creating their most delicious and popular Culinary Delight known Around The World. You will learn my  History that goes back Decades. You will not only learn how to follow a recipe, you will share an experience and tap into your inner passion! Learning, Laughing and Building your Self Confidence with any Ingredient that comes your way down he road!   I will guide you with technique, tips, tricks while using equipment you have in your own kitchen. I will walk you step-by-step through the process and the end result will be delicious and beautiful authentic Greek Spanakopita! Then for the Brie Twist...We will Take a Wheel of Brie and Stuff it with the Leftover Spanakopita Mixture, Wrap in Phyllo for a Show Stopping Appetizer! I am a passionate Chef that loves Food and Loves teaching others the Miracle of easy ingredients that transform your kitchen and you into the Fabulous World of Culinary Treasures!New to Cooking? Never Worked with Phyllo Dough? Never tried Greek Food? Well you are in the right place. I will walk you through every step, explaining and answering questions as I cook along with you, never leaving your side. I'll be sharing  stories and experiences that changed my life. I will also revel the famous person who convinced me to become a Chef!  Let's get Excited!! Tasty Travels~ Chef Steff
about_author: I have been a Professional Chef for over 35 years, graduating for Culinary Arts School in MD. I am passionate about the Food Culture~History~ Experience a person can have with me. I have been teaching -sharing my Fabulous Recipes and Techniques with people from all over the US. I also have a Catering Business which allows me to be creative on a larger scale. Creating and planning Themed Menus for all Events and Special Occasions. I LOVE Airbnb & Hosting Guests in my Home. This would be an opportunity for me to not only Share my home but to invite everyone into "My Kitchen of Life". Teaching not only fun easy recipes and techniques but share cooking tips and tricks  for so many recipes. Also, I want to build confidence in those that watch, laugh & learn from me as I share stories and history while we prepare the chosen recipe.

title: Learn to Make Perfect Pies
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: Hands up if you'd take a piece of pie (tart for our U.K. friends) over cake any day?! Keep 'em up if you're a fan of really flaky, tender, buttery crusts and mouthwatering juicy fruit fillings...!Welll, sound's like you're ready to learn our secrets to making perfect pies at home. This class is all about flaky, tender, fruity desserts: learn the key to great pie dough, brainstorm ideas for fabulous fillings, and then finish off with some pretty lattice, braid, or cut-out decorations to make your pie a seriously gorgeous baked creation. Using the simplest ingredients and a fun teaching style, we'll have your from-scratch pie ready and in the oven by the end of the class. You can ask any questions you have about pastry (or baking in general!) and learn lots of great info about the ingredients we use. Plus, we can chat, and drink tea, and fantasize about crazy wonderful desserts and generally just become best, if temporary, frends..! Just trust us (or see all our glowing reviews *blush*) you're going to wow everyone, and yourself, with your newfound pie skills. P.S. We have LOTS of availability! If you don't see the date or time that works for you, just send us a message, we're always happy to accommodate - and if you'd like a bigger group than the max listed here, that's fine too, just drop us a line!
about_author: Hello dessert lovers! I'm Jess, a lifelong baker, founder of a baking school, host of a TV baking show, and author of a cookbook!! As you can probably tell, I'm slightly sugar obsessed, and I LOVE sharing this passion with others, and helping everyone see how easy baking can be! Yes, It's a science, but it's so much simpler than you think! Join me and my lovely team of teachers to learn simple, impressive, fingerlickin' delicious desserts, I promise I can teach anyone to become a dessert master!

title: Making Brazilian Brigadeiro with a Dominican twist
address: Dominican Republic, Dominican Republic¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in English, Spanish, and Portuguese
act_int: Making traditional brazilian truffles with a Dominican twist? Sounds bizarre...but here we are! Get ready to experience the ultimate mix of two beautiful and colorful cultures!We will make a variation of the brazilian brigadeiro and add a little Caribbean "spice" to this experience!  We will make this delicious and chocolatey dessert while we talk about Dominican and Brazilian culture and learn some portuguese and/or Dominican vocabulary and, who knows? Maybe even do a little dancing!
about_author: I am Dominican-American living in Santo Domingo since 2019. I make a living out of teaching math, science, and Portuguese and I own a successful Brazilian Brigadeiro business here in the Dominican Republic. I have a degree in Latin-American Studies where my main focuses were the Caribbean and Brazil. My love for Brazilian (and Lusophone) culture began in 2017 while living in Orlando, Florida, USA and after traveling to Portugal where I was able to build lovely friendships with many Brazilians in both places! I am also proud of my Dominican roots and love to talk about our culture, music, and cuisine everywhere I go.  As fate would have it, I started making brigadeiros in 2020 right before the pandemic struck the globe. However, my growing passion for this sweet helped me build a successful business in the last 2 years!

title: Sugar cookie making and decorating
address: Montreal, Quebec, Canada¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: You don'tneed to be a pro cookie decorator to wow everyone with your skills! Take our simple cookie class and you'll come away with all the tips and tricks you need to become a sugar cookie specialist! You'll do everything from start to finish in this fast-paced, fun class. We'll start off making a batch of tender, sweet sugar cookies (you can personalize the flavour from our tantilising list) , then pop them in the oven and move on to royal icing - a favourite of the professionals. Then, we'll practice some easy and beautiful designs, before decorating our cooled cookies. Whether you're into cute lovehearts, marbled designs, or cookies with messages, we've got you covered - and if you have a custom design in mind, we can help you make it come to life!Fun for bakers of all levels, especially beginners, and anyone with a sweet tooth who wants to up their game in the kitchen. And if your office team or family have a competitive streak - we're happy to jusge a 'best decorated cookie' competition at the end...!
about_author: I'm Jess, and I lead the team here at The Lincoln Apartment Bakery. I've been teaching baking for over ten years, I'm the host of TV's 'Flour Power' and author of The Lincoln Apartment Bakery Cookbook. Can't wait to introduce you to my amazing team, bake with you and show you all our secrets...!

title: Scottish Baking Yummy Scones
address: Dunblane, United Kingdom¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: In this online class join me in your kitchen where we will bake and prepare Traditional Scottish Recipes.  I will share my Love of Scotland with you and maybe teach you a few Scots words and phrases while we cook.The experience will be an hour and a quarter. We will bake truly yummy Fruit Scones.We will first introduce ourselves, get out all the ingredients, and talk about everything we need to do. Then I will take you through the recipe step by step together.By the end of the class we will have baked our Sconed and said Slange Var (cheers in Scottish) with a wee dram of Whisky or maybe just a wee cup of Tea.I will share alternative ideas and serving suggestions and answer any culinary questions you might have.After your booking, you will receive an email with the list of the equipment and ingredients needed for the class.Other things to noteYou‚Äôll need an internet connection and the ability to stream audio and video to participate. A link and details on how to join will be included in your booking confirmation email.Up to 10 guests of all ages can attend.
about_author: Professional and passionate Foodie!!Hi I'm a qualified Chef and Teacher born and bred in Scotland.  After many successful years in the hospitality industry,  I now teach Food Science, cookery and baking.My passion is baking and creating delicious baked goods. I would Love to pass on my tips and tricks and help you create your own Scottish delights at home.

title: Essence of Greece, Sweet from Crete
address: ŒëŒ∏ŒÆŒΩŒ±, Greece¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
act_int: I invite you to discover Greece and my grandmother's hometown,Crete, and make together some unique and healthy sweet recipes!  With some of the basic ingredients of Greek cuisine,like flour,nuts,honey,milk and olive oil,we'll find out how imaginative and creative Greek tradition is! A selection of some of my favorite recipes ,with few ingredients and many options!  ‚òÜSo,lets travel to Crete and make  'KALORIZIKA' ,the traditional biscuits with almonds and sesame, 'PIES OF SFAKIA' ,the extra thin Cretan pies ,that are baked in a pan,stuffed with soft cheese and drizzled with honey,and their 'siblings'... 'WATERY PIES', same ingredients,different technique...‚òÜ If you are a group of 2 or more,you can choose the alternative menu  CREAMS:From the pot on the spot!and make,'MELALEVRIA', a sensational cream with honey and butter, 'MILK PIE',baked cream with semolina and lemon  All recipes are easy to make. The little 'secrets' make the whole difference! So,experienced or beginner,we will take it step by step and we will make some delicious sweets!I'm expecting you to cook together!  *If you have a special request for a date or time that it is not listed,send me a message! *Pricing is per person**By choosing this experience,you also support many stray cats of Athens,with food and medical care! Thank you!
about_author: I have been cooking for 30 years now, I am a self taught cook and I have worked in professional kitchens, I have created menus for traditional taverns and alternative Greek bistros and i have collaborated with the 'Institute for the Greek mills' ,in creating an educational program for kids,concerning the Greek customs and the recipes they are connected with. I have always loved cooking for others and sharing any knowledge I had on the food and nutrition of Greece ,which ,I believe,contains a wisdom and enough imagination,that even the greatest chefs would envy.. :)Being an Airbnb superhost for five years,has proved my grandmother right ,when she was teaching me that "we must always honor our guests"!  I did my best for my apartment's guests, I'm hoping to do it as successfully for my experiences' guests! :)

title: Decorated Cookies and Alfajores Class
address: Montevideo, Uruguay¬∑ Part ofAirbnb Online Experiences
time_end: 90 mins ¬∑ Hosted in Spanish and English
act_int: Welcome to my decorated cookie class! This recipe is a fire that you will repeat every time you want to celebrate! It is ideal for families, team buildings & friendsThe experience will last a little more than 1 hour, and we will make cookies and typical alfajores from South America, which we will eat later!If there are any left over, I will show you some cute ways to present it so that later you can give it to whoever you want (friends, grandparents, teachers)!Other highlightsIt is important to be able to get certain basic supplies before the experience (Flour, Cornstarch, Eggs, Sugar) and a mixer. And if you have the possibility to get some not so basic, much better (coloring, chocolate, sprinkles)
about_author: Hi, I'm Flopi, the creator of The Chivito Experience, cooking is my passion and sweet things are my weakness! My mother always tells me that when I was a child, I would hide in the closet with my grandmother to eat chocolates. I have been cooking since I was a child, and I teach that hobby to my two young children, and to all the people of all ages who come to celebrate their birthday or other event at my Casa de T√® Secreta.
